features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride fabric[10,000mm/5,000g]is highly breathable, waterproof, and quick drying; PFC-free DWR coating
Fully-taped seams create the ultimate seal against foul weather
Thermacore insulation[60g]for focused warmth and enhanced breathability, Nylon taffeta lining
Room-to-Grow system extends the length of the legs by 1.5in to keep up with growth spurts
Anti-scuff cuffs with hook-and-loop cuff elevators; Water-resistant boot gaiter; External hook-and-loop waistband adjustment Belt-loop ticket O-ring
Zippered thigh pocket and microfleece-lined hand-warmer and back pockets with hook-and-loop closure
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
